products.title: Windsor, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: Vivid and vibrant, the windsor red simply refuses to be missed. Its bold colour suits the soft sheen of the silk-like fabric perfectly, and the cloth is a lightweight yet highly durable one, backed with polycotton sateen lining for long-lasting protection. The red is one for the glamorous, so do it justice by pairing with rich golds for a strikingly eye-catching look that will make your home one of contemporary class.

products.title: Windsor, Sandstone - Roman Blind
products.description: A gently shimmering pale gold, emphasised by the satin-feel fabric, the windsor sandstone is a blind of class and elegance. The silky cloth works wonderfully as a roman blind, easily falling into folds, and complementing the gentle curves. Craft a look of understated glamour in your living room by grouping the sandstone with cream walls and soft furnishings, wood-look tongue and groove flooring, and brushed gold oddments and accessories.

products.title: Windsor, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: There's no black more striking than one with a deep, shimmering sheen, and that's what you get with the windsor in black. Raised ribbing catches the light further, increasing the feeling of texture and character to the blind. Use the black in a contemporary setting, teaming it with a boldly patterned wallpaper in shimmering silvers. Pick a sumptuous purple or a luxe forest green to use as your accents, placing them throughout the room in the form of cushions, lamps, and ornaments.

products.title: Windsor, Antique - Roman Blind
products.description: Camel gold, with gentle ribbing and a silky, flawless finish, the windsor antique offers quite an aesthetic. The smooth fabric blends beautifully into roman folds, stabilised with sewn in batons to prevent sagging and ensure that your blind will last you for years. Opt for a striking look in your master bedroom by setting the antique with a jet black shade. Pattern the walls with a gold and cream damask wallpaper, with hints of black, and choose black bedlinen and rugs, burnished with the occasional gold accent.

products.title: Windsor, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: A sweet and sumptuous blind, mixing contrasting feelings of purity and grandeur, the windsor ivory incorporates pale, luxurious white and blends it with a silky smooth, lightweight fabric, all falling together into the gentle curves of the roman style. Keep your bedroom light and airy, with a touch of luxe, by hanging the ivory amongst pale pink or mint green walls, and accenting throughout the room with a darker version of your chosen colour.

products.title: Windsor, White - Roman Blind
products.description: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. It will look particularly attractive against a petrol blue shade to craft a contemporary nautical look in the bathroom.

products.title: Windsor, Latte - Roman Blind
products.description: Gorgeous in soft, vintage gold, the windsor latte is reminiscent of creamy coffee or warm, sticky caramel, making it a delectable and attractive blind. Texture is added to the silky soft fabric using slightly raised ribbing scattered occasionally across its surface. Set the latte against a bold cornflower blue, using it as both a tempering neutral and an highlighting accent to make the blue truly pop.

products.title: Paradise, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: The autumn country tones of the paradise in auburn are pretty and understated, displaying an array of wispy florals and foliage across a white base. With pinks, greens, and yellows included in the palette, this is a subtly colourful piece that will work in a variety of dcor schemes. Team the auburn with apple greens in the kitchen, where some chalk paint will make over your units, and creamy walls will offset the green beautifully.

products.title: Kensington, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorned with colourful fruits, the kensington in stone is sure to whet the appetite. The grey-toned white of the background provides a serene base that allows the deep blue, red, and coral hues to truly pop, offering a gorgeously understated sensation of colour. This array of fruit surely belongs in the kitchen or dining room. Place against a feature wall in deep blue or burnt orange and use the same colours to accent with accessories throughout the rest of the room.

products.title: Abstract, Powder - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty, colourful patterning of the abstract in powder displays an artistic style of dcor that will be welcome in any kind of home. Combining mustard yellows with deep teals and cool ice blues, the look is a peaceful and serene one. Surround the powder with similar cool blues, including pale aqua walls, and ice white tones to enhance the light and airy look of the blind. Go for contemporary furniture, with sleek clean lines, warming the room up a little with an array of different textures and fabrics.

products.title: Jungle, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: The jungle pebble blends fun and exciting illustration with similarly eye-catching colouring. A softly toned grey forms the canvas of the piece, with teal blue, apple green, mustard oranges, and candy pinks shading the pretty jungle imagery. The result? An unusual yet irresistible window covering. A child's bedroom or playroom would be an obvious choice for the pebble, where surrounding it with similarly fun shades will surely stir your child's imagination.

products.title: Honesty, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Colourful and charming, the honesty in ochre just oozes personality. Displaying a contemporary foliage print, in ice blues and burnt browns, all on a tangy brown background, this roman blind gives a stylish look to any home. Give the ochre a home in a neutrally dcorated guest bedroom, surrounded by soft ice blue walls and biscuit coloured soft furnishings. Choose plenty of textured fabrics for a feeling of warmth and cosiness in the room that those staying in it will just love.

products.title: Abstract, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Abstract is as abstract does, and in natural, it just lives and breathes beautiful, ethereal patterning. Almost navy mixes with muted mustard yellow, giving life to creamy greys and washed out maroons. The outcome? A softly pretty roman blind full of character. Hang the natural in the hallway or landing to add just a hint of colour to an often neglected area of the home. Surround with neutral walls, but accent with similar blues or reds in the form of wall art and ornaments.

products.title: Honeycomb, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a subtle honeycomb patterning, filled with abstract style daisies in the centre, the honeycomb in stone blends soft grey tones with off-white and sunny yellow. The look is fairly contemporary but will work well in any setting where a tempered, muted feel is on the cards. For a look that will be bang on trend, hang the stone against a soft yellow wall in a study or guest bedroom, where your room will be fashion forward with a grey and yellow colour scheme.

products.title: Honeycomb, Teal - Roman Blind
products.description: To give a big pop of colour to your home, consider the honeycomb in teal. This rich canvas of dark and light teal tones, with honeycomb shapes filled with daisies, offers a strikingly abstract look that you're sure to love. Use the teal to liven up a bright white study or home office, adding a little inspiration as you get down to work. Accent the colours of the fabric with matching teal hues in the form of ornaments and oddments, going for ice white and contemporary furniture.

products.title: Hollihocks, Candy - Roman Blind
products.description: The hollihocks in candy gives the impression of a country cottage garden in midsummer bloom. Bold, sugar-sweet shades of pink and coral make its name apt, and the gentle lavender and green tones offset them perfectly. The candy deserves pride of place in a cheerily toned kitchen, where it's sure to brighten up mealtimes. Hang amidst cream or off-white units, pale apple green walls, and bright coral accessories.

products.title: Capri, Yellow - Roman Blind
products.description: If you're looking for something bold, bright, and just a little bit tropical, then you'll find it in the capri yellow, where a sunny yellow forms the base for gorgeous fuchsias, pale sky blues, and lush lime greens, tempered by the occasional gentle taupe, charcoal black, and soft white. Give the yellow pride of place by hanging in a contemporary living room. Keep the bases of the room, such as the walls and floor, neutral and unobtrusive, adding pale grey or taupe sofas, and accessorise with one or two of the brighter tones from the blind.

products.title: Phoebe, Summer - Roman Blind
products.description: The phoebe in summer is a quirky rainbow of colour, offering an abstract foliage print in pastel shades of lilac, aqua, pink, and green, accented by deeper hues of black, blue, and grey. The overall look is one of funky character and certainly one for colour lovers. Hang the summer in a studio or creative area, where the variety of colours will leave you inspired. Don't be afraid of adding more colour throughout the rest of the room either, opting for paler shades found in the blind, such as pale aqua.

products.title: Phoebe, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: Blues are the stars of the show in the phoebe aqua, but they're not on their own. Cobalt, sky, and aqua blues are mixed with fun shades of apple green, lemon yellow, and coral orange, resulting in a fun and eclectic look sure to liven up any living space. Add the aqua to a room in need of some inspiration, such as a plain utility room or hallway, or a creative space such as an art studio or playroom.

products.title: Phoebe, Rainbow - Roman Blind
products.description: Once the phoebe rainbow is on display, there's no missing it. A contemporary and somewhat abstract floral pattern displays rose pinks, sunshine yellows, and citrus oranges, as well as apple greens and petrol blues, forming a plethora of colour across the canvas. Use the rainbow in any room where you want to make a statement. A room with plenty of sunlight will complement this blind best, and surround it with similar sunny yellow and oranges for a cheery, uplifting look.

products.title: Leonardo, Spice - Roman Blind
products.description: In gorgeously rich shades of burnt orange and regal blue, the leonardo spice makes a grand gesture, and its off-white background fits perfectly. The intricate stitching only adds to the quality feel of the fabric and the look is stunningly attractive. Bring your hallway or landing to life by adding the spice to off-white or pale oatmeal walls. Include accessories, wall art, and ornaments in matching burnt orange tones, with the occasional blue thrown in for contrast, texture, and depth.

products.title: Feather, Coffee - Roman Blind
products.description: As easy on the eye as a feather is soft to the touch, the feather in coffee blends a classic image with contemporary styling and warming colour. A latte shade takes centre stage, with feathers drawn in soft cream, giving a pretty, lightweight look and feel to the blind. Add the warmth of the coffee to a similarly toned bedroom, surrounding with shades of cream and latte throughout the room. Go for rich, plush fabrics for a feeling of homeliness and luxury, giving the room plenty of texture and depth.

products.title: Morrison, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: Form a contemporary look with the eye-catching pattern and alluring shades of the morrison in dove, where a grouping of slate and dove greys create a distinctive and imaginative print on a nimble and relaxed cloth for chic style with little effort. Combine the soothing tones of the dove with a similar base of subdued grey or white, accenting the striking print with alike designs and contrasting charcoal oddments.

products.title: Morrison, Heather - Roman Blind
products.description: Use the morrison in heather to create a modish and sophisticated look with silver and lavender hues in a distinguishing and elegant design, formed from a nimble cloth with fine, silky thread to generate a graceful blind with breaths of soothing colour and creative style. By combining a stormy palette with the delicate heather, you can create a relaxing and tasteful retreat. Match the thundery tones and silver hues of the blind with alike shades and contrasting white to form an attractive base for mauve touches and connecting colour.

products.title: Kasian, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: A neutral mixture of soft white, hushed taupe, and creamy oatmeal, the kasian natural showcases a contemporary abstract pattern that's sure to fit in anywhere. The attractive fabric, complemented by high quality fixtures, looks like it was made for those soft roman folds. Allow the natural to temper a room filled with deep chocolate tones, perhaps even against a brown feature wall, where it will offset the tones perfectly.

products.title: Kasian, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: In soft rose red, tempered by ice white and gentle taupe, the kasian in red displays a contemporary curved patterning. The quality fabric accentuates the neat folds of the roman shape, ensuring that this blind will look attractive wherever it's placed. Hang the red in a modern kitchen, surrounded by white units, walls, and furniture, and red accessories throughout. Source appliances and utensils in similar shades of red for a truly coordinated look that's sure to wow your family and guests alike.

products.title: Corsica, Mauve - Roman Blind
products.description: The light mauve and apple green of the corsica mauve are a summer dream come true, with a pretty pattern of florals and foliage interwoven with each other across a soft white canvas. The look will work as part of either a contemporary or traditional dcor scheme. Use the mauve to add some gentle colour to your bathroom, where it will look stunning against a white bathroom suite and tiling. Accent with towels and accessories in matching greens and lilacs.

products.title: Corsica, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The corsica range is one filled with class and sophistication, without giving up its traditional floral roots. The gold offers this pretty floral pattern in a golden yellow and parchment grey, resulting in a stunningly understated feel all over. Give the gold a home in your living room or guest bedroom, where the subtle yellow tone will add a hint of cheer without overwhelming the room. Surround with greys and similar shades of yellow for a coordinated look, opting for silver fittings and fixtures, and perhaps the occasional ornament or oddment.

products.title: Kershaw, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Soft neutrals and contemporary florals meld together in the kershaw natural, a beautifully styled roman blind with a timeless sense of sophisticated and an understated air that will offset most colour schemes. Bring a tempered patterning to a bright or bold feature wall in your living room, where the natural will sit pretty against a deep chocolate brown or rich red shade. Add plush fabrics to the rest of the room for a cosy feel that you'll want to sit back and relax in.

products.title: Kershaw, Wine - Roman Blind
products.description: Ever true to its name, the kershaw in wine is a striking array of deep wine red tulip-shaped florals on a neutral background of pale biscuit camel. This stylish roman blind seems contemporary yet traditional, making it well-suited to all kinds of homes and settings. Place the wine in the kitchen amidst neutral, cream, or white units, accented by matching wine reds for mood and character. Go for clean lines and straight edges to keep the look simple yet effective.

products.title: Kershaw, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The kershaw gold features a neutral blend of soft golds and gentle greys in the form of contemporary florals on a golden oatmeal background. The outcome is one of modern traditionalism, with an understated yet pretty effect that will suit any home. Use the gold as a subtle feature in a hallway or landing, where you might not want to overpower a smaller space but would like to add some interest and definition.

products.title: Toucan Talk, Tropical - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a lively, colourful, and charismatic array of toucans and parrots, the toucan talk tropical is nothing if not fun. The vibrant colour palette is indeed tropical, and the birds look like they could be in deep conversation. Whilst this fun and characterful blind would be ideal for a little one's bedroom or playroom, it's not exclusive to children. Adults will love the sweet illustrations too, so consider using it to breathe some life and vivacity into your kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Paradise, Fennel - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring fennel green tones, alongside yellows and whites, this pretty offering from the paradise range is aptly named. The lush foliage and florals depicted are reminiscent of a country paradise, making this a work of art in its own right. Create a serene utopia for your guests to rest up in by using the fennel in your spare bedroom. Surround with similar greens, accenting occasionally with yellows and whites, and keep the general look and feel of the room tranquil and relaxing.

products.title: Paradise, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: The naturally toned paradise in saxon blue offers gorgeous shades of green and blue on a soft white background. And, made from 100% cotton, its smooth fabric sits neatly in attractive roman folds, looking right at home wherever it's hung. Use the saxon blue to breathe colour into the living room, surrounding it with matching cool blues, as well as the occasional green to accent. Add plenty of fresh cotton and linen fabrics in the form of throws and cushions for extra cosiness.

products.title: Carlotta, Blossom - Roman Blind
products.description: An intricate weave of pretty florals and weaves, the carlotta in blossom features rich shades of pink alongside sunny yellows and leafy greens. The look is classic, yet contemporary enough that it would work in a variety of homes and dcor schemes. Use the blossom to bring your hallway or landing to life. This gorgeous roman blind can be your walkway's key feature, taking centre stage amidst similar pinks and rich creams.

products.title: Carlotta, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: The stylish light grey acts as the perfect canvas for the flourish of natural colours that make up carlotta pebble. The vibrancy of the pinks and reds is matched by the vitality of the greens and yellows to create a stunning visual that is a treat for your eyes. Dress the living room to impress with the inspired choice of carlotta pebble. Add in a matching lampshade and a set of scatter cushions to create a theme that welcomes you in without overpowering your senses.

products.title: Carlotta, Wisteria - Roman Blind
products.description: Looking pretty is what the carlotta wisteria does best, and these richly colourful blossoms are here to prove it. Lilacs, mauves, and blues are wonderfully offset by greens and yellows, forming an elaborate knot of florals that will add character to any home. Mix the wisteria with matching mauves in a bedroom or living room, opting for a light and airy look that will feel like summer all year round.

products.title: Coco, Autumn - Roman Blind
products.description: The coco in autumn blends smooth and silky texturing with soft autumnal colours for a beautifully three-dimensional feel. A creamy biscuit background is host to large, patterned leaves displaying fine stitching and in gorgeously golden mustard, bronze, and ivory tones, with hints of red thrown in for added depth. Use the autumn to display a classically cosy look in a living room or den, setting it amongst rich creams and golden browns in the form of walls, floors, and furniture.

products.title: Coco, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: Offering a natural yet contemporary look, the coco in green is the ideal choice for an understated look in a modern home. The palest of greens and a pretty stone grey sit on top of a green-hued oatmeal background, with the leaf illustrations only serving to accentuate this natural style. The green will work perfectly in a kitchen that gets plenty of natural light - but even if it doesn't, this blind's light tones will help to preserve what light you have.

products.title: Hollihocks, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The gorgeous shades of navy, teal, and pink in the stunningly country-style hollihocks navy stand out beautifully against the pale background and olive green accents. With it's linen-feel woven fabric, this roman blind is the perfect addition to a more rural setting. Pair the navy with country cream or palest blue walls in the kitchen or dining room for a fresh garden style. Use the vibrant colours of the fabric to choose accenting accessories in various shades, from placemats to utensils.

products.title: Oasis, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The oasis charcoal is a beautiful hybrid of abstract patterning and colourful foliage. Mauves and blues meet alongside rich charcoal, surrounded by a cool off-white tone. The blind has an ethereal quality that would look stunning in both contemporary or period homes. Make a feature of the charcoal by placing it against a wall in the palest of greys. Furnish the room in medium woods, dusky blues, and muted mauves, being sure to add in plenty of plush fabrics for extra comfort and style.

products.title: Nairobi, Pastel - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty, unusual patterning of the nairobi in pastel displays a quirky style that art lovers will adore. Combining baby pinks with soft lilacs and pastel blues, adorned with attractive leopard imagery, the look is subtle yet effective. Surround the pastel with alike pastels, setting it against soft cream walls, and using the colours in the blind to accessorise throughout the room. Go for luxe, comfortable soft furnishings, making a room that you and your guests can really relax in.

products.title: Honesty, Jewel - Roman Blind
products.description: The honesty in jewel boasts an ivory cream background adorned with foliage imagery in chocolate browns, mustard yellows, and deep teals, giving a somewhat abstract air to a contemporary blind. Give the jewel pride of place in your hallway or landing, surrounding it with neutrally toned walls and warm brown toned accessories. Don't forget to add in the occasional pop of teal to add depth and colour to this neutral colour scheme.

products.title: Aretha, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: A beautiful take on a paisley pattern, the aretha range just screams sophistication. The natural mixes a light aqua turquoise with varying shades of chocolate, coffee, and oatmeal, interspersed with burnt orange accents. Use the natural to give your living room a rather grand look, setting it against golden oatmeal walls and opting for plenty of wooden furniture, and perhaps even wooden flooring too.

products.title: Aretha, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The aretha in navy offers colour galore, blending beautiful shades of rich indigo, deep teal, bright coral, and warm fuchsia with muted tones of green, grey, and beige. The end result is bold and striking, with unforgettable colour. Use the navy as the star of the show in your living room or dining room. Surround with equally rich colours, tempering with soft creams and neutrals as needed. You'll end up with a warm and cosy room full of rich colour and character.

products.title: Abstract, Sherbert - Roman Blind
products.description: To add a burst of colour to your windows, bear in mind the abstract in sherbert. A multi-coloured canvas, in a mix of greens, pinks, and yellows, offers a stunning combination of patterning and shading. Use the sherbert to jazz up a neutral or white utility room, adding a little cheer as you enter to do your washing. Accent the blind with matching hues in your various household accessories if you can, but otherwise, this blind will stand on its own two feet just fine.

products.title: Oasis, Forest - Roman Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the oasis forest is a stunning collection of green foliage imagery, with ferns, leaves, and the occasional floral sitting resplendent in apple, forest, and teal greens. The blind has an abstract feel to it that gives it a contemporary yet artistic look. Hang the forest in a nature-themed room amidst fellow greens and turquoises, tempered with off-whites for balance. Contemporary furniture will work well, as will natural wickers and woods.

products.title: Nairobi, Ink - Roman Blind
products.description: To add some real pizazz to your windows, consider the nairobi in ink. A leopard print canvas in transparent blues and reds plays host to beautifully illustrated leopards in various poses, offering the perfect combination of colour and wildlife. Use the ink to brighten up a jaded hallway or landing. Accent with matching blues, perhaps even opting for a blue feature wall. Add the occasional animal print if you dare, for a fun and eye-catching dcor scheme your guests are unlikely to forget in a hurry.

products.title: Nairobi, Snow - Roman Blind
products.description: The nairobi in snow adds a casual sense of glamour to any room, with its chocolate animal print and beautiful sketches. The fabric contains linen, giving it lasting durability as well as that classic linen look and feel. Hang the snow amidst similar browns and creams, and consider a deep chocolate feature wall for a striking look. Add shimmering golds and plush camels for a truly luxurious style, and be sure to throw in plenty of soft fabrics for extra comfort.

products.title: Honesty, Cerise - Roman Blind
products.description: On a soft biscuit background sits a foliage pattern featuring pale oatmeals, deep pink-reds, and rich golds, occasionally interspersed with a pop of turquoise teal, and that makes up the prettily contemporary honesty cerise. This roman blind's linen feel means it will hang beautifully in any home. Give your utility room, downstairs cloakroom, or entrance hallway a spot of colour by hanging the cerise in pride of place.
